12.2仲弓問仁。¶

# src: LY 12.03; tr. CH
12.3司馬牛問仁。¶
子曰：¶

「為之難，¶

12.4司馬牛問君子。¶
子曰：¶

我獨亡。」¶

子夏曰：¶

# src: LY 12.06; tr. CH
12.6子張問明。¶
子曰：¶

# src: LY 12.07:01; tr. CH
12.7子貢問政。¶
子曰：¶
「足食，¶
足兵，¶

12.8棘子成曰：¶

# src: LY 12.09:01; tr. CH
12.9哀公問於有若曰：¶
「年饑，¶
用不足，¶
如之何？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_012-17a>¶

# src: LY 12.10; tr. CH
12.10子張問崇德、辨惑。¶
子曰：¶
「主忠信、¶
徙義，¶
崇德也。¶

是惑也。¶
『誠不以富，亦祗以異。』」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_012-21a>¶	KR1a0102_010:6a:2:1:0,KR1a0110_003:31b:7:18:289,KR1b0048_006:22b:2:2:2,KR1c0033_011:3b:6:17:1,KR1c0033_011:4a:1:19:1,KR1c0042_004:50b:5:31:2,KR1e0081_011:157a:2:20:10,KR1g0009_006:16b:4:20:3,KR1h0004_012:14a:43:1:13,KR1h0006_006:31b:5:40:36,KR1h0007_012:8b:4:15:12,KR1h0007_012:9a:3:17:12,KR1h0015_006:14b:8:17:6,KR1h0015_007:13b:3:33:6,KR1h0017_012:23b:8:18:63,KR1h0017_012:24a:2:13:64,KR1h0017_012:24b:3:14:66,KR1h0017_012:25a:1:15:68,KR1h0017_016:15b:6:4:63,KR1h0017_016:15b:11:11:64,KR1h0017_016:16b:3:8:65,KR1h0020_003:15b:4:18:62,KR1h0021_000:151a:5:18:671,KR1h0026_006:24b:4:18:72,KR1h0026_006:25a:2:9:73,KR1h0028_011:43b:1:14:170,KR1h0038_010:33a:12:1:171,KR1j0076_054:11b:8:16:10,KR2k0056_038:22a:7:6:340,KR3a0030_022:32b:6:4:4,KR3a0047_042:26b:6:6:11,KR3a0108_017:42b:1:6:39,KR3j0021_013:25a:3:3:1,KR3j0051_005:4b:6:20:0,KR3j0132_004:9b:6:16:1,KR4d0327_027:7a:1:21:5,KR4d0398_020:9b:6:16:1,KR4e0090_047:22b:7:6:43,KR4e0100_019:13b:7:2:10,KR4h0090_003:10b:1:10:28

# src: LY 12.11:01; tr. CH
12.11齊景公問政於孔子。¶

# src: LY 12.11:02; tr. CH
公曰：¶
「善哉！¶

子不子，¶

必也使無訟乎！」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_012-25a>¶	KR1a0007_014:31a:5:2:1,KR1a0024_003:7b:8:1:1,KR1a0034_003:8b:7:4:0,KR1a0054_006:2b:5:1:4,KR1a0059_002:17a:6:9:0,KR1a0073_003:2b:1:11:0,KR1a0074_012:13b:2:16:74,KR1a0118_001:23b:3:7:0,KR1a0139_027:27a:7:8:315,KR1b0003_019:22a:8:18:6,KR1b0004_018:48b:3:31:12,KR1c0012_003:24a:2:8:0,KR1c0012_003:24b:5:12:0,KR1c0012_003:27a:4:10:0,KR1c0012_009:16a:4:8:0,KR1c0019_002:2a:1:15:2,KR1c0021_000:18b:8:39:29,KR1c0022_002:15b:4:11:9,KR1c0044_007:29a:8:35:125,KR1d0005_003:12a:6:33:1,KR1d0013_003:45a:7:9:8,KR1d0052_043:1a:120:1:19,KR1d0053_060:9a:8:9:1,KR1d0053_060:17a:3:38:1,KR1d0053_060:17a:6:4:1,KR1d0054_019:9b:5:23:0,KR1d0057_151:26a:1:9:0,KR1d0057_151:26a:7:20:0,KR1d0061_005:1a:6:5:2,KR1d0061_005:1a:9:24:2,KR1d0068_073:24a:1:9:13,KR1d0068_073:24b:5:8:13,KR1d0076_002:2a:6:10:2,KR1d0086_074:50a:3:4:509,KR1g0005_006:4b:5:13:4,KR1g0005_006:7a:3:6:6,KR1g0009_006:17b:6:9:3,KR1g0009_012:12a:3:9:10,KR1h0004_012:24a:4:1:17,KR1h0005_006:18b:3:9:0,KR1h0006_006:33a:1:18:39,KR1h0006_006:33a:3:21:39,KR1h0007_012:10b:6:15:14,KR1h0007_012:11a:1:22:14,KR1h0007_012:11a:3:16:14,KR1h0007_012:11a:5:5:14,KR1h0012_006:24b:9:9:65,KR1h0012_006:25b:2:8:66,KR1h0015_000:11a:9:9:21,KR1h0015_006:15b:6:9:6,KR1h0017_012:27a:11:9:79,KR1h0017_012:28a:9:20:83,KR1h0019_002:90a:6:9:269,KR1h0019_002:90a:8:18:270,KR1h0020_003:16b:10:9:67,KR1h0020_003:17a:7:16:68,KR1h0021_000:152b:4:9:677,KR1h0024_001:34a:7:9:13,KR1h0024_001:34b:3:11:13,KR1h0024_011:30b:1:23:6,KR1h0026_006:26a:8:9:78,KR1h0027_000:64b:8:9:89,KR1h0028_000:73b:3:9:97,KR1h0028_009:61a:3:9:183,KR1h0029_000:28b:10:9:51,KR1h0032_000:1b:13:7:14,KR1h0032_000:12b:13:7:141,KR1h0032_001:8a:5:7:22,KR1h0032_006:20b:5:7:54,KR1h0034_000:40b:7:9:172,KR1h0034_009:54b:6:9:186,KR1h0038_001:9a:8:9:51,KR1h0038_010:36b:5:9:183,KR1h0041_000:39a:5:9:122,KR1h0043_000:41a:10:9:118,KR1h0043_012:35b:3:9:65,KR1h0056_003:10a:1:9:25,KR1h0056_005:28a:1:9:77,KR2a0001_500:1630a:33:1:3321,KR2a0002_120:1b:5:6:1,KR2a0004_122:1b:3:20:1,KR2a0007_090:2a 12.16子曰：¶

何如？」¶

「子為政，¶
焉用殺？¶

必偃。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_012-31a>¶

「善哉問！¶

非惑與？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_012-33a>¶

# src: LY 12.22:01; tr. CH
12.22樊遲問仁。¶
子曰：¶
「愛人。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_012-34a>¶
問知。¶
子曰：¶
「知人。」¶

樊遲退，¶
見子夏
曰：¶
「鄉也
吾見於夫子而問知，¶	KR1g0009_006:20b:4:22:3,KR1h0004_012:24a:88:3:31,KR1h0005_006:21b:4:8:0,KR1h0007_012:15a:6:19:20,KR1h0007_012:15b:6:29:20,KR1h0012_006:29b:9:19:79,KR1h0015_006:18a:5:30:6,KR1h0017_012:38a:8:19:125,KR1h0019_002:95a:6:19:283,KR1h0019_002:95b:2:14:284,KR1h0020_003:20a:7:19:80,KR1h0021_000:156b:9:19:695,KR1h0024_011:33b:4:26:6,KR1h0026_006:30b:9:19:96,KR1h0028_009:70a:4:10:219,KR1h0034_009:64b:3:10:222,KR1h0038_010:42a:4:10:220,KR1h0039_001:45b:6:11:219,KR1h0043_012:47a:5:10:101,KR1j0065_022:20a:6:3:10,KR3a0059_009:30a:6:10:6,KR3k0050_076:8a:6:20:2,KR4f0062_008:6b:3:20:55,KR4h0056_007:1a:8:13:5

何謂也？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_012-36a>¶

# src: LY 12.22:03; tr. CH
子夏曰：¶

選於眾，¶
舉伊尹，¶
不仁者遠矣。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_012-37a>¶	KR1a0117_011:5b:8:3:13,KR1b0055_001:36b:4:6:401,KR1h0004_012:24a:98:1:32,KR1h0004_012:24a:102:1:32,KR1h0007_012:15a:9:2:20,KR1h0007_012:15a:9:17:20,KR1h0007_012:15b:1:20:20,KR1h0007_012:15b:8:24:20,KR1h0007_012:15b:8:39:20,KR1h0007_012:16a:1:34:20,KR1h0015_006:18a:8:23:6,KR1h0015_006:18b:1:12:6,KR1h0043_012:47b:3:11:105,KR1h0043_012:47b:4:5:105,KR2d0005_032:30b:1:4:1,KR2d0005_032:30b:1:19:1,KR2f0038_016:15b:7:9:53,KR2f0038_016:15b:8:2:53,KR3j0040_019:5b:2:5:11,KR3j0082_008:17a:3:5:3,KR3j0082_008:17a:4:2:3,KR3j0082_037:13b:2:16:3,KR3k0008_043:4b:5:18:8,KR3k0008_043:4b:5:33:8,KR4f0062_008:6b:5:20:55,KR4f0062_008:6b:6:15:55,KR4h0076_010:2b:2:3:2,KR5c0070_003:025a:6:4:13,KR5c0070_003:025a:7:3:13,KR5c0113_014:030a:9:4:3,KR5c0113_014:030a:10:3:3,KR5c0123_019:018a:7:10:10,KR5f0021_015:002b:7:17:3,KR5h0033_008:031a:2:11:40,KR5h0033_008:031a:3:9:40,KR5i0078_004:04p014a:2:12:36,KR6r0053_016:1088a:1:3:1,KR6r0146_010:0635c:19:6:1

# src: LY 12.23; tr. CH
12.23子貢問友。¶
子曰：¶
